home.title: Prepare the Web for AI Agents
home.subtitle: The web is entering a new era: AI agents are becoming first-class users of the internet. We help you get ready with best practices and documentation for an agent-ready web.
home.cta: Get GEO updates and best practices in your inbox.
home.agentReadyIntro: Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) means making your site readable, actionable, and secure for autonomous agents. Readable: structured data and clear semantics so agents extract facts without guessing. Actionable: forms, APIs, and clear CTAs so they can complete tasks. Secure: boundaries via robots.txt, llms.txt, and Content-Signal so you stay in control.
home.geoReadabilityDesc: Structured data, clear semantics, and machine-parseable formats so agents extract facts without guessing.
home.geoActionabilityDesc: Clear CTAs, forms, and APIs so agents can complete tasks — not just read content.
home.geoSecurityDesc: Expose what agents need without leaking sensitive data. Set boundaries via robots.txt, llms.txt, and rate limiting.
home.latestGlossaryIntro: Concepts, tools, and standards for the agentic web.
home.requestAuditSub: We'll analyze your site's readiness for AI agents and deliver actionable recommendations.

footer.tagline: Prepare the web for AI agents. Best practices and documentation for the agentic web.

privacyPage.intro: We respect your privacy. This policy describes how we handle your data.
privacyPage.dataCollectedContent: We collect the data you submit via forms (newsletter, contact, audit requests): email address, optional message content, and website URL for audit requests. We also use Google Analytics 4 for anonymized usage statistics.
privacyPage.purposeContent: Data is used to respond to your requests, send newsletters if you subscribed, and improve our site and services.
privacyPage.retentionContent: We retain form submissions and analytics data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes above, or as required by law.
privacyPage.rightsContent: You have the right to access, rectify, or delete your data. Contact us via the contact page to exercise these rights.
privacyPage.cookiesContent: We use Google Analytics 4 with anonymized IP. You can disable cookies in your browser. No advertising cookies are used.
privacyPage.dpoContent: For privacy requests or to contact our data protection contact, use the contact form.

auditPage.heroTitle: Is your website ready for AI agents?
auditPage.heroSubtitle: We analyze your site's structure, data, and content against GEO best practices — and deliver actionable recommendations so your content can be discovered, cited, and used by agents.
auditPage.ctaDocs: In the meantime, explore our documentation and the quick-start checklist to self-assess.
auditPage.valueContent: Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) is about making your site readable, actionable, and secure for autonomous AI agents. A GEO audit evaluates how well you're set up: structured data and semantics, agent-facing files (robots.txt, llms.txt, Content-Signal), performance, and security — so you get a clear roadmap aligned with our reference documentation.
auditPage.whatWeCoverContent: Our audit follows the same pillars as our docs: crawlability (robots.txt, sitemap.xml, llms.txt), structured data (Schema.org, JSON-LD, Open Graph), semantic HTML and actionable DOM, security (headers, rate limiting, data exposure), performance and Core Web Vitals, and accessibility. We reference our checklist and documentation in the report.
auditPage.faq1Q: How long does an audit take?
auditPage.faq1A: We typically respond within a few business days and deliver the full report within one to two weeks, depending on scope.
auditPage.faq2Q: What do I need to provide?
auditPage.faq2A: Just your website URL and, optionally, context about your goals. We handle the rest.
auditPage.faq3A: Contact us for pricing. We offer tailored options depending on site size and depth of analysis.
auditPage.metaDescription: Request a GEO audit. We analyze your site's readiness for AI agents and deliver actionable recommendations aligned with our documentation.
